source:
TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
A crafter makes and a warrior unmakes. What then is an adventurer, who does both and more?
※The crafting portion of this quest is recommended for Disciples of the Hand level 16 and above, and the battle portion for Disciples of War or Magic level 49 and above.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_SEQ_00 Schwierigkeitsanpassung
※ Dieser Auftrag wird für Charaktere ab Stufe 49 als Krieger oder Magier und ab Stufe 16 als Handwerker empfohlen.

Jezul Ahuatan hat einen speziellen Auftrag für dich.

source:
TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_SEQ_01Jezul Ahuatan wonders if you might be able to craft some hyperconductor components. You must begin by collecting an unusual material. In the Ogre's Belly in the Coerthas highlands, there are many fell things─among them a swarm of will-o'-the-wykes. Slaying one will draw the ire of St. Daniffen's fire, from the vanquished husk of which you can obtain a sample of semi-stable ectoplasm.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_SEQ_01 Die Schwierigkeit des Auftrags wird an die aktuelle Stufe angepasst.

Jezul Ahuatan hat dich mit der Herstellung beauftragt. Erlege im zentralen Hochland von Coerthas zunächst , bis erscheint. Besiege das Monster und nimm ihm ab.

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_SEQ_02<tab>The ectoplasm pulses with hypnotic energy, but you have better things to do than stare slack-jawed into the light. Present the ectoplasm to Norbettaux at Camp Dragonhead, and ask him to grant you access to the crafting facility.
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_SEQ_02<tab>Du hast <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8A16020502 /var> bekommen. Bring es zu Norbettaux in Camp Drachenkopf und bitte ihn um Erlaubnis, seine Arbeitsstätte nutzen zu dürfen.

source:
TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_SEQ_03Norbettaux has prepared the crafting facility for your use. With the materials you have obtained, synthesize two high-quality hyperconductor components, and deliver them to Jezul Ahuatan at Ehcatl.

※In the event that the status Facility Access: Detailing II wears off or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Norbettaux.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_SEQ_03Norbettaux hat dir erlaubt, die Arbeitsstätte zu benutzen. Stelle aus 2 her und bringe sie zu Jezul Ahuatan in Ehcatl.

※ Falls du den Status Arbeitsstätte: Feinarbeit II verlierst oder die Synthese ein Fehlschlag ist, sprich mit Norbettaux, um einen erneuten Versuch zu starten.

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_SEQ_04<tab>Jezul Ahuatan pronounces the hyperconductor components more than satisfactory, and pays you the compliment of speaking to you as kindred. Though you have never been and never will be the Second of Ehcatl, you understand of what he speaks─that a <var 08 E905 ((woman's)) ((man's)) /var> work is more than the sum of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> jobs.
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_SEQ_04<tab>Du hast <var 32 ((ItemHQ)) 03 ((　8125)) 030502 /var> bei Jezul Ahuatan abgeliefert. Als Nummer zwei am Platz ist er viel beschäftigt, aber er nimmt sich die Zeit dazu, deine Handwerksfertigkeiten ausführlich zu loben. Besonders, dass du den weiten Weg nach Ishgard auf dich genommen hast, rechnet er dir hoch an.

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_TODO_00<tab>Slay a will-o'-the-wyke to lure out St. Daniffen's fire.
TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the ectoplasm to Norbettaux at Camp Dragonhead.

TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_TODO_02<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize hyperconductor components <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var>)) ((Deliver the hyperconductor components <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to Jezul Ahuatan the Second)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_TODO_02<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Handwerker-Notizbuch (Wilder Stamm) St.6: <var 32 ((ItemHQ)) 06 ((　8125)) 020502 /var> herstellen)) ((Jezul Ahuatan <var 32 ((ItemHQ)) 03 ((　8125)) 020502 /var> geben)) /var>

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_000<tab>Good, your crafting hands are? Squee-squee... Sluggish are our ships, more than I like...and more than is liked by Chief Totoloc. Need top-top-top hyperconductor components, we do.
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_000<tab>Ich bin Jezul, Nummer zwei in Ehcatl, rechte Schwinge von Sezul! Kha! Und als Nummer zwei ich befehle dir, zwei <var 32 ((ItemHQ)) 06 ((　8125)) 030502 /var> zu machen! Khaaa!

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_010<tab>Not complicated, you would think. Just improve aetheric conduction in metal plates, say some. Know─squawk!─they do. Tricky-tricky is wind-aspected aether. Special material, this process requires.
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_010<tab>Damit Ätherstrom gut geleitet wird, wir brauchen gute Metallplatte, stark gegen Element des Winds!

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_020<tab>Increase conduction for wind-aspected aether, a certain type of emulsion will. Hardly believe the ingredients needed, you would. Squee-squee...
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_020<tab>Damit Ätherstrom gut geleitet wird, wir brauchen gute Lackierung, stark gegen Element des Winds!

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_030<tab>Tricky matter, it is...squee-squee. Using hyperconducting matter in components, an elegant solution it is. But sqqquawk! Easy feat to obtain such things, it is not.
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_030<tab>Damit Ätherstrom gut geleitet wird, wir brauchen stabile Bauteile, stark gegen Element des Winds!

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_040<tab>A slug of semi-stable ectoplasm from St. Daniffen's fire, you will need. This creature, you know? Dwell in the Ogre's Belly, they do. Lie to you, I will not. Squawkka-wak! Before the end, killings, there will be.
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_040<tab>Gehst du noch einmal Schneeland, in den engen, dunklen Ogerbauch. Nimmst du dort <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 02F20BB0020402 /var> <var 32 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8A16020502 /var> ab. Mit Gewalt, wenn es geht!

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_041<tab>At your fighting weight, you are? Difficult, it is, with featherless ones. Thewy, you must be. Swarm, the Ogre's Belly does, with will-o'-the-wykes. Slay one, you must, then squawkka-wak! Come charging, St. Daniffen's fire will. Kill quick-quick-quick, then wring out the ectoplasm, you must.
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_041<tab>Musst du <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 06 ((　2918)) 030502 /var> jagen, damit das Biest kommt. Dann machst du zwei <var 32 ((ItemHQ)) 06 ((　8125)) 030502 /var> in Camp Drachenkopf.

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_042<tab>Is common, the rest of the material. Supply your needs for two components, the crafting facilities at Camp Dragonhead will. Be sure of that, you can. Squawk! Reliable, Norbettaux is.
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_042<tab>Ja, sag ich doch! Bring <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8A16020502 /var> zu Norbettaux in Camp Drachenkopf! Geh! Khaa!!

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_050<tab>Craft those hyperconductor components, you will? Settled, the stomach is? Sqqquawk! The material you need, take from a St. Daniffen's fire, you can. In the Ogre's Belly, the creature dwells. Is a bit nasty, the milking, squawkka-wak...but no other good choices, there are.
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_050<tab>Musst du <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 06 ((　2918)) 030502 /var> in Ogerbauch jagen, damit <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 03F20BB0020202 /var> kommt. Dann nimmst du <var 32 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8A16020502 /var> und bringst nach Camp Drachenkopf.

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_POP_MESSAGE<tab>You see the baleful glow of St. Daniffen's fire!

TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_NORBETTAUX_000_090<tab>Welcome to our humble crafting facility! You're a touch pale─a rigorous bout of gathering, I take it? Crafting will put the roses back in those cheeks in no time!
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_NORBETTAUX_000_090<tab>Hast du dich verlaufen oder bist du mal wieder zum Arbeiten hier? Na, dann mal in die Hände gespuckt!

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_NORBETTAUX_000_091<tab>Hm, a curious sort of material you've brought... Best not to know more, I think. The crafting facility has a goodly stock of many materials. Help yourself to whatever you need.
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_NORBETTAUX_000_091<tab>Ich weiß ja nicht, was du damit vorhast, aber <var 1A 02 /var>das<var 1A 01 /var> sieht man ja nicht alle Tage. Bitte, lass dich nicht stören.

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_NORBETTAUX_000_100<tab>Do come calling if you need more material, or need to spend more time using the facilities.
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_NORBETTAUX_000_100<tab>Wenn dir das Material ausgeht oder du die Arbeitsstätte wieder benutzen möchtest, frag mich einfach ganz zwanglos.

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_NORBETTAUX_100_100<tab>How marvelous, you've finished! I must say, that was one of the odder materials I've seen in a while, but now you have some fine-looking components to deliver. Do feel free to return if the components do not pass the client's muster─your visits are always a welcome diversion!
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_NORBETTAUX_100_100<tab>War's das? Dann machst du dich jetzt sicher wieder auf den Weg. Du bist hier immer gerne gesehen, also schau einfach mal wieder vorbei, wenn du was brauchst.

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_130<tab>Not bad, you look. Bad dreams, you will have? Sqqquawk, happy I am to see you alive. Lost are many, for a squirt of ectoplasm...but complete, the components are?
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_130<tab>Kha! Besuchst du Schneeland? Hast du seltsames Material geholt? Gute Arbeit, <var 08 E905 ((Federlose)) ((Federloser)) /var>. <var 08 E905 ((Gute Handwerkerin)) ((Guter Handwerker)) /var>, <var 08 E905 ((gute Freundin)) ((guter Freund)) /var>.

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_131<tab>General conduction...good, it is. Wind-aspected conduction...good, it is! Squawkka-wak! Not the limit, the sky is! Fly better-better-better, the ships will. Top-top-top, these components are!
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_131<tab>Luftschiff bald fertig, wird gutes Luftschiff. Baust du viele Teile, reist du viele Lände für uns. Deine Bauteile, immer gut, beste Bauteile. Stark und ... ja, stark, kha!

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_132<tab>Fight, you can, and craft, you can, but more important─<var 1A 02 /var>work<var 1A 01 /var>, you can! For the Second of Ehcatl, the same is required. Sqqquawk! But only about the skills, it is not. The will to use them, it is─use high and low, day in and day out...squawkka-wak!
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_JEZULAHUATAN_000_132<tab>Ohne dich, wir nie Luftschiff zu Ende bauen können. Danke, <var 08 E905 ((Federlose)) ((Federloser)) /var>. Du bist <var 08 E905 ((eine gute Freundin)) ((ein guter Freund)) /var> der Wolkengleiter. Khaaa!

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_POPMESSAGE_000_200<tab>You now have access to the crafting facility.
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_POPMESSAGE_000_200<tab>Die Arbeitsstätte steht dir jetzt zur Verfügung.

source: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_SYSTEM_200_200<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
target: TEXT_BANIXA605_01566_SYSTEM_200_200<tab>Gegenstände normaler Qualität, die im Rahmen dieses Auftrags angefertigt wurden, sind nutzlos und sollten weggeworfen werden.
